verses: Amazing grace how sweet the sound That saved a wretch like me[ns]I once was lost, but now I'm found Was blind but now I see
'Twas grace that taught my heart to fear And grace my fears relieved[ns]How precious did that grace appear The hour I first believed
Through many dangers, toils, and snares I have already come[ns]This grace that brought me safe thus far And grace will lead me home
When we've been there ten thousand years Bright, shining as the sun[ns]We've no less days to sing God's praise Than when we first begun
Some glad morning when this life is over I'll fly away;[ns] To a home on God's celestial shore I'll fly away
Just a few more weary days and then I'll fly away;[ns] To a land where joy shall never end I'll fly away
Yeah, when I die, Hallelujah, by and by I'll fly away[nc]
songs.chorus: I'll fly away, oh, Glory I'll fly away; When I die, Hallelujah, by and by I'll fly away

verses: Alas! and did my Savior bleed And did my Sovereign die?[ns] Would He devote that sacred head For sinners such as I?
Was it for crimes that I had done He groaned upon the tree?[ns] Amazing pity! grace unknown! And love beyond degree!
Well might the sun in darkness hide And shut his glories in[ns] When Christ, the mighty Maker died, For man the creatureâ€™s sin.
Thus might I hide my blushing face While His dear cross appears[ns] Dissolve my heart in thankfulness, And melt my eyes to tears.
But drops of grief can ne'er repay The debt of love I owe;[ns] Here, Lord, I give my self away 'Tis all that I can do.
songs.chorus: At the cross, at the cross Where I first saw the light, And the burden of my heart rolled away[ns] It was there by faith I received my sight, And now I am happy all the day!

verses: His name is Wonderful, His name is Wonderful, His name is Wonderful, Jesus my Lord;
